aboutMe.introPart1: I'm an enthusiastic developer dedicated to excellence and innovation in every project I undertake.
aboutMe.introPart2: My diverse background in veterinary medicine, lab work, teaching, and research gives me a unique perspective to create innovative solutions. This enables me to tackle problems creatively and deliver standout results.
aboutMe.introPart3: My experience in team management and interdisciplinary collaboration allows me to lead effectively and excel in team environments.

education.title: Explore my education and training:
education.coderItem1: Web Development: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React.js
education.vetItem1: In 2020, I received my degree in Veterinary Medicine with a focus on clinical practice and laboratory research, teaching, and investigation
education.vetItem2: Developed strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and team leadership

experience.title: Tap to explore my achievements and roles:
experience.CV: You can also take a look at my CV:

responsibilities: Design and development of responsive websites with React.js using frameworks like Bootstrap, Material-UI, and Tailwind CSS, working closely with clients to understand their needs and provide customized solutions.
Development of efficient and scalable RESTful APIs with Node.js.
Integration with relational databases (SQL with Sequelize) and non-relational databases (MongoDB with Mongoose).
Communication and coordination with clients and development teams to establish and meet delivery deadlines.
Version control with Git.
Backend team leader.
Development of a website that allows users to find restaurants and rural gastronomic offers, make reservations, and write reviews.
Implementation and design of RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js.
Execution of CRUD operations in MongoDB to manage data efficiently.
Implementation of secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
Integration of Stripe for secure payment processing, handling transactions, refunds, and subscription management.
Integration of interactive maps into web applications using OpenStreetMap and Leaflet.
Collaboration with cross-functional teams, including frontend developers, designers, and project managers.
Development and creation of custom websites for US clients.
Collaboration in multidisciplinary teams to make decisions and project efficiency.
Web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js implementing interactive and adaptable user interfaces.
Backend development and database integration with MongoDB.
Responsible for supervising the hospitalization area, leading a team of veterinary assistants, and designing/implementing diagnostic and treatment plans.
Interaction with clients to provide information and answer questions about veterinary services and procedures.
Hematological tests, blood biochemistry, and urinalysis.
Processing, organization, and administration of samples from start to finish.
Data entry and subsequent control, ensuring accuracy and reliability.
Inventory and equipment maintenance, ensuring efficient laboratory operations.

University Lecturer and Researcher.company: Pathology Laboratory, Faculty of Veterinary Sciences, National University of La Plata
responsibilities: Teaching Veterinary Pathology courses, supervising students, and contributing to interdisciplinary teaching and research groups.
Participation in research projects focused on pulmonary diseases in cattle, involving cytological and histopathological diagnostics, data entry, statistical analysis, and publication of findings.
Statistical analysis of research results and contribution to scientific publication with data presentation.
Organization of educational events and workshops within the veterinary community.

data.title: MyVetHub
data.description: This single web application streamlines veterinary clinic management by allowing users to create, modify, and delete patient records, including detailed characteristics and medical history. It supports easy updating of clinical histories and offers advanced filters for efficient patient searches.

data.title: CDCommerce
data.description: This mobile app offers a streamlined e-commerce experience for record enthusiasts. Users can browse, purchase, and manage items in their cart. It includes a user profile with photo upload and location settings, enhancing personalization and convenience during shopping.

data.title: Diagnovet Lab
data.description: This mobile app offers a streamlined e-commerce experience for record enthusiasts. Users can browse, purchase, and manage items in their cart. It includes a user profile with photo upload and location settings, enhancing personalization and convenience during shopping.
